subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: The three-time Vuelta a España champion Roberto Heras of Spain has reportedly quit professional cycling after serving a two-year ban for doping.Heras’s doping ban ended in October, but under the sport’s code of ethics, he cannot join a ProTour team for two more years.“I have thrown in the towel,” Heras, who tested positive for EPO in the 2005 Vuelta, told the sports daily Marca.
